item.title: New version
item.description:
Version 1.0.0.6
  • Added "-tray" command-line option to minimize application at Windows startup.
  • Added window snapping to the screen edges by holding Shift key.
  • Project updated up to Visual C++ 2015.
  • Reduced setup size by excluding C++ redistributables.
Version 1.0.0.5
  • Fixed "Show online avatars only" option.
  • Added tray menu.
  • Setup built by InnoSetup 5.5.6.
Version 1.0.0.4
  • Added more options.
  • Added application auto-start after upgrade.
  • Improved debugging log.
  • Improved setup.
  • Minor optimizations.
Version 1.0.0.3
  • Added auto-restoring after login errors.
Version 1.0.0.2
  • Added start at Windows startup option.
  • Added avatar list context menu.
  • Minor bugfixes.
Version 1.0.0.1
  • Fixed case of display names.
  • Improved image cache.
  • Added online/offline delay time (5 minutes).
Version 1.0.0.0
  • Initial release.
